К самой игре особо претензий нет. Не могу порекомендовать ее по тому, что купив игру, установив кучу аддонов, заплатить по итогу не малую сумму, я получил игру в которую я не могу играть. Ожидание матча ни разу не проходило менее 20 минут, а в большинстве случаев ждать приходится не менее 40 минут, что иногда приводит к тому, что просто кончается терпение. По итогу поиграв в игру около 8 матчей за неделю,а больше просто не получилось, я больше не хочу ее запускать. Данная проблема не у меня одного. Если пошарить по форумам, то можно найти огромное кол-во людей с аналогичной проблемой. Живу не в мухосранске, кстати, в Москве и с интернетом проблем нет.

Je ne me lasse pas de ce jeu après plus de 540h. Je me sale dessus mais je me tape aussi des barres, en solo ou en team avec des potes.
Quoi qu'on en dise, Behaviour se démène constamment pour offrir du contenu.
Alors oui, il y a des bugs, oui, on critique souvent ce jeu en plaisantant mais on y revient toujours, en tout cas pour ma part.
Bref, c'est le seul jeu sur lequel je reviens toujours avec plaisir.
many dlcs,characters and maps to keep you interested in the game

I'm not going to pretend that this game isn't a unique experience that any other game can give, but only sometimes is it rewarding. The current servers as of the date of this review are anywhere from unplayable with horrible micro-stutter, random teleporting and poor detection to a fine experience almost devoid of problems. But often times, it's somewhere closer to the former. You can edit most of the effects that are normally changeable in game only by going to Dead by Daylight's %appdata% folder, meaning in order to get a real amount of FPS you have to look up youtube tutorials. Unacceptable. The developers genuinely don't know what they are doing and were lucky their game took off in the first place, and now don't know how to fix the problems that have been created along the way. When one thing is fixed, a million other problems arise. There doesn't seem to be any real desire to give a balanced game across most maps for both killers and survivors. They change things based on their paying audience, which is largely the "survivor mains". I only recommend buying this game on sale after watching others play and deciding for yourself if you can get ~50 hours of fun on either Killer, Survivor, or both.

I would highly recommend you keep an open mind and a massive lack of salt in your system to play - But if you do, it can be immensely fun. I won't lie and say, "Toxicity in here is all in the mind!" No, it's not. It's very present. I will say that when you find some good people to play with be it randoms or people you know, it is very fun. I have not experienced any bugs. Graphics are well toned. Balance leaves something to be desired. Content amount is fairly solid.
8.1/10 I have fun when I play.
